caption.p: The effects of different doses of AG (1,5 and 10 µM) on tri-lineage differentiation potentials of cells from SPFP tissues on day 21. ( A) Osteogenic differentiation: (Runx2, OPN), ( B) Adipogenic differentiation: (PPAR-γ2, LPL), ( C) Chondrogenic differentiation: (Sox9, Aggrecan). Gene expression of tri-lineage potentials was assessed using real-time PCR. The bar means SD. Data is shown as mean ± SD ( n = 10). Statistical significance was calculated using a one-way ANOVA test and significance is represented on graphs as * p-value < 0.05.
